advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
Want full episodes of all of your favorite Spike shows? Consider it done.

Get the latest episodes of Bar Rescue, Ink Master, Tattoo Nightmares, fights from Bellator MMA, plus behind-the-scenes clips and extras not available anywhere else. Sign in with your TV provider to access all full episodes that are available in the app. It’s great Spike stuff, all in one place - we’re with you wherever you’re headed. 

This app requires iOS 7. AirPlay support is coming soon, we promise. Our tech team is making it happen…for you.

Features:
· Full episodes available next day
· The best bouts Bellator MMA has to offer
· Archive selections, including Deadliest Warrior and 1000 Ways to Die
· Continue watching right where you left off
· Share the best clips with your friends

Full episodes available now:
Bar Rescue
Ink Master
Deadliest Warrior
Tattoo Nightmares
Tattoo Nightmares: Miami
Auction Hunters
Hungry Investors
Catch A Contractor
Cops
Bellator MMA fights
Frankenfood
Thrift Hunters
1000 Ways to Die
Repo Games
World’s Worst Tenants
Urban Tarzan
Plus more shows added all the time.

Need help? We’re with you. Contact help@spike.com
